actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individual retirement accounts and individually-directed accounts to acquire coins issued by North American countries.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to include as "collectibles" the coins issued by North American countries, thus requiring their acquisition by an individual retirement account or by an individually-directed account to be treated as a distribution for certain income tax purposes.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individual retirement accounts and individually-directed accounts to acquire coins issued by North American countries.
